abstract: Presents a modal view that covers as much of the screen as possible when binding to a Boolean value you provide is true.

declaration.code: nonisolated func fullScreenCover<Content>(isPresented: Binding<Bool>, onDismiss: (() -> Void)? = nil, @ViewBuilder content: @escaping () -> Content) -> some View where Content : View

overview:
## Discussion

Use this method to show a modal view that covers as much of the screen as possible. The example below displays a custom view when the user toggles the value of the `isPresenting` binding:
